data.descriptor: Award of Order / Receipt of Order
data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Award_of_Order_Receipt_of_Order
data.news_body:
The company has file writ petition before the Honble High Court of Delhi challenging the Order dated December 3 2024 passed by Regional Director Northern Region Ministry of Corporate Affairs Delhi directing the change in name of the company was listed for hearing on today. 
The Matter was heard on November 24 2025 and the impugned order has been quashed by the Honble High Court. Accordingly the matter stands disposed off.

The order of the copy is not available on the e-portal. The company shall file and submit the same upon its availability.

data.news_body:

data.news_body:
Pursuant to the SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) regulations 2015 and code of Conduct for Prevention of Insider Trading it is notified  that the closure of Trading Window for dealing in equity shares of the company for all promoters Promoter Groups KMPs and Designated Persons/insiders and their immediate relatives shall commence from Tuesday 1st April 2025 keeping in view approval of Financial Results for the Quarter and Year ended 31st March 2025

data.caption: Material Development/Updates To The Intimation Filed Pursuant To Regulation 30 Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015
data.news_body:
In continuation to our disclosure dated February 202025 and December 10 2024 regarding the filing of writ petition before the Honble High Court of Delhi against the order of Regional Director Northern Region Ministry of Corporate Affairs  Delhi  directing  a change in the name of the company  pursuant to Section 16(1)(a) of the Companies Act 2013 we wish to inform the following-
The High Court of Delhi at New Delhi directed the respondent not to give effect to the impugned order till the next date of hearing.

data.caption: Material Development/Updates To The Intimation Filed Pursuant To Regulation 30 Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015
data.news_body:
In continuation of our disclosure dated December 10 2024 regarding the order issued by the Regional Director Northern Region Ministry of Corporate Affairs Delhi  directing a change in name of the company we wish to inform the following-

The company has filed writ petition before Honble High Court of Delhi on February 19 2025 challenging the said order. 

This disclosure is being made for your information and records.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Intimation Regarding Postponement And Rescheduling Of Board Meeting
data.news_body:
SPL INDUSTRIES LTD.has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 14/02/2025 inter alia to consider and approve With reference to the earlier announcement dated February 4 2025 pursuant to Regulation 29 of the Securities Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirement) Regulations 2015 and other applicable provision(s) this is to inform you that due to unavoidable circumstances the Meeting of Board of Directors which was scheduled to be held on Wednesday February 12 2025 at 11:30 A.M. is now postponed and re-scheduled on Friday February 14 2025 at 11:30 A.M. at the corporate office of the company at Plot No- 21 Sector-6 Faridabad- 121006 Haryana inter alia to
1. Consider & approve the Un-Audited Financial Results (Standalone & Single Segment) for the quarter/nine month ended on 31st December 2024.
2. Any other business with the permission of the Chair.

data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we write to inform that Mr. Sanjay Gupta, Chief Financial Officer (CFO) & Key Managerial Personnel (KMP) of the company has tendered his resignation vide letter dated 29th October, 2024, citing heath concerns and personal reasons.

data.news_body: In compliance with Regulation 74(5) of SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulations, 2018 please find enclosed herewith copy of the certificate received from Kfin Technologies Limited, Registrar and Share Transfer Agent of the company confirming dematerialization within 15 days from date of receipt of the certificates from the Depository Participants , for the quarter ended September, 2024

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body: Pursuant to regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligation and Disclosure Requirement) 2015, we wish to inform that the shareholders of the company in its Annual General Meeting held on 28-09-2024 at 11:00 AM have approved the Change in designation of Mrs. Shashi Aggarwal  as Wholetime Director of the company & Mr. Vijay Kumar Jindal as Director of the company

data.caption: Voting Results & Consolidated Scrutinizer'S Report
data.news_body: This has reference to our letter dated 28th September, 2024, regarding intimation of Proceedings of Annual General Meeting held on 28-09-2024 at 11:00 A.M. through VC. We are submitting consolidated scrutinizer report on remote e-voting and voting conducted at AGM and Voting results of AGM in compliance with applicable provisions and regulations.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: Pursuant to the SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015 and code of conduct for prevention of Insider Trading, it is hereby notified that the closure of Trading Window for dealing in equity shares of the company for all Promoters, Promoter Group, KMPs and Designated Partner/insiders and their immediate relatives, shall commence from 1si October, 2024, keeping in view of approval of financial results for quarter/year ended 30-09-2024The closure of Trading Window will continue upto 48 hours after the date of approval of the aforesaid financial results by the Board of Directors of the company.

data.caption: Shareholder Meeting / Postal Ballot-Outcome of AGM
data.news_body: In compliance to the provisions of Companies Act, 2013, the rules notified thereunder, SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, Secretarial Standard on General Meetings issued by Institute of Company Secretary of India and the various circular issued by Ministry of Corporate Affairs and SEBI, the Annual General Meeting of the company was called, conveyed, held and conducted on Saturday, September 28, 2024. The Proceedings/outcome of the meeting is attached for your reference.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: Please find the attached extract of Newspaper advertisement published w.r.t Notice of 33rd Annual General Meeting and E-voting information of the company in the following newspaper-a) Business Standard (English)b) Business Standard (Hindi)

data.caption: Service Of Notice And Annual Report For Financial Year 2023-24 By Email To The Shareholders
data.news_body: This is to inform that, pursuant to Part A(12) of Schedule III to Regulation 30, copies of the Notice and Annual Report for 33rd Annual General Meeting of the company for FY 2023-24 scheduled to be held on Saturday, September 28, 2024, has been sent to the shareholders of the company on or before 4th September, 2024 via email, to those shareholders, who have registered their email id with company/DP

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: Please find the attached copy of newspaper advertisement published in Business Standard (English and Hindi), intimating that the 33rd Annual General Meeting of the company will be held on Saturday, 28th September, 2024 at 11:00 A.M. through VC/OAVM

data.caption: Record Date And Cut Off Date For The 33Rd Annual General Meeting
data.news_body: The record date and cut off date for the purpose of 33rd Annual General Meeting shall be 21 September, 2024

data.caption: Book Closure For The 33Rd Annual General Meeting
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 42(5) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirement) Regulations, 2015, as amended from time to time, Register of Member and Share Transfer Books of the company will remain closed from 22nd September, 2024 to 28th September, 2024 (both days inclusive) for the purpose of 33rd Annual General Meeting which is scheduled to be held on Saturday, 28th September, 2024 through VC/OAVM at 11:00 A.M.The Cut of date for the purpose of 33rd Annual General Meeting shall be September 21, 2024

data.caption: Reg. 34 (1) Annual Report.
data.news_body: In compliance with Regulation 34 of SEBI (Listing Obligations & Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (as amended from time to time), please find attached herewith 33rd Annual Report of the company for the Financial Year 2023-24.

data.caption: Notice Of 33Rd Annual General Meeting Of SPL Industries Limited
data.news_body: This is to inform that the 33rd Annual General Meeting of SPL Industries Limited will be held on Saturday, September 28, 2024 at 11:00 A.M. (IST) through Video Conference/Other Audio Visual Means. The Notice of the 33rd Annual General Meeting of the Company is enclosed herewith.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body: With reference to captioned subject and pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform that the board of directors of the company have approved the change in designation of Mr. Vijay Kumar Jindal and Mrs. Shashi Agarwal

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body: With reference to the captioned subject and pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI LODR Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company have noted/approved the resolutions as set in outcome of Board Meeting

data.news_body: This is to inform you that the Board of Directors in their meeting held today i.e. 13th August, 2024 have approved the Un-Audited Financial Results (Standalone & Single Segment) for the first quarter (FY 2024-25) ended 30th June, 2024. data.news_body: SPL INDUSTRIES LTD.has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 13/08/2024 ,inter alia, to consider and approve Pursuant to Regulation 29 of SEBI (Listing Obligations & Disclosures Requirements) Regulations, 2015, meeting of board of directors of the company is scheduled to be held on Tuesday, 13th August, 2024 at 11:30 A.M. at corporate office at Plot No. 21, Sector 6, Faridabad 121006 to consider and approve the unaudited financial results for quarter ended 30-06-2024

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On 30Th May, 2022 To Consider And Approve Audited Financial Results Of The Company For The Fourth Quarter And Year Ended 31St March, 2022
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that the Board of Directors in their meeting held today i.e. 30th May, 2022 have approved the Audited Financial Results (Standalone & Single Segment) for the fourth quarter and year ended 31st March, 2022. A copy of Audited Financial Results along with the Audit report for the fourth quarter and year ended 31st March, 2022 on standalone basis is attached herewith.
We would like to confirm that M/s Raghu Nath Rai & Co., Statutory Auditors of the Company have issued Audit Report with unmodified opinion on these financial results.
The Board Meeting commenced on 03:00 PM and concluded at 09:45 PM
This is for your information and records please.
